name: 365 Days in Kuala Lumpur
description:
Returning to her homeland after spending practically her entire life up in the States, 19 year old Melody had expected anything but a fated encounter. And neither had her new friends. Join the trio, Melody, Skeru and Blanc as they venture through every nook and cranny of Malaysia's capital, and the people they meet, along with the bonds they make along the way. A tale of comedy, friendship, tragedy, and life awaits all.

W.I.P

Music,

Title: Travel Light

Author: Jason Shaw
